properties.description: 1st & 3rd Saturday, every month. We provide a selection of teas, proper filter coffee, snacks, and soft drinks or juice, all free of charge. There are art and craft activities or materials available at each session suitable for all ages, or your welcome to bring along your own project. If you prefer to be outdoors, you can also join Helena our gardener, in the grounds. Everyone is welcome!
